In: Jadon Sancho, Aaron Wan-Bissaka, Raphael Varane, Kalidou Koulibaly, Declan Rice, Saul Niguez

Out: Valencia, Darmian, Rojo, Herrera, Mata, Sanchez

[telegraph]

Harsh reality is Matic wouldn't have made that mistake last night - but that's not a compliment. Matic is so risk-aversive he'd have played it back to De Gea. Fred is more adventurous, so errors are likelier with him. Matic shouldn't necessarily come straight back in. #mufc
